physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a man in a white uniform, with headgear and short sleeved collared top and mid-lengthed shorts. He is posed with his right hand on his hip. Behind him, there is a structure of a house, with a tall bush on the right. The edges of the photograph are uneven.
sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony, this collection is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
title_text: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  "Edward Avery, S.P.O., H.M.S. Emerald, ""The Haven"""
context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
